name: Google Underline
description: Brings back the old look of google search results after the changes introduced in March 2014.
additional_info:
ver 0.3
  * 'news for' box title underlined and font/spacing adjusted

ver 0.2
  * added support for all google domains (as listed on Wikipedia)
  * colors of links and text adjusted
  * newsbox underlining fixed
  * spacing of results adjusted (if you don't like it, remove the lines starting with "li.g")

ver 0.1 
  * quickly hacked together
  * look based on old screenshots
  * not extensively tested
  * any feedback appreciated

discussions.name: Suggestion: visited page link color needs to be darker
Visited link color needs to be darker
